ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | lsmub1.p | |- .(+) = ( LSSum ` G ) |
| 2 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` G ) = ( Base ` G ) |
| 3 | 2 | #P_subgss | |- ( T e. ( SubGrp ` G ) -> T C_ ( Base ` G ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_subgsubm | |- ( U e. ( SubGrp ` G ) -> U e. ( SubMnd ` G ) ) |
| 5 | 2, 1 | #P_lsmub1x | |- ( ( T C_ ( Base ` G ) /\ U e. ( SubMnd ` G ) ) -> T C_ ( T .(+) U ) ) |
| 6 | 3, 4, 5 | #P_syl2an | |- ( ( T e. ( SubGrp ` G ) /\ U e. ( SubGrp ` G ) ) -> T C_ ( T .(+) U ) ) |
